product_name: Hoka One One Conquest Road-Running Shoes - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The women's Hoka One One Conquest Road-Running Shoes are ideal for runners looking for highly responsive and cushioned shoes for moving fast on paved trails and city streets.
